reviews.review:
This game offers an interesting point of view of the Black Mesa incident. Playing this after finishing Half-Life feels like discovering Black Mesa again, uncovering more secrets about the facility.

In addition, there is a different variety of weapons to use, which are a lot of fun.

Overall, its pretty similar to Half-Life, so if you liked that game you might consider checking this one out too.
Must play when you love Half Life!

I love the perspective change and the new guns.

[h1] HALF LIFE : OPPOSING FORCE [/h1]

Half-Life: Opposing Force, Half-Life 1'e DLC [i] (DLC'den çok genişleme paketi) [/i] olarak gelmiş 2 [i] (Blue Shift 2. oyun) [/i] oyundan birincisi.

Opposing Force, her ne kadar ana oyunun kalitesinde bir oyun olmasada gayet doyurucu oynanış saati [i] (ortalama 5,5 - 6 saat sürüyor) [/i] ve orjinal oyunun mekaniklerinin üzerine koyduğu birkaç güzel özellik ile eğlenceli bir oynanış sağlıyor.

Ana karakterimiz bu sefer Gordon Freeman değil tam aksine devlet tarafından Gordon Freeman'ı öldürmesi için görevlendirilmiş bir onbaşı. [u] ''Adrian Shephard.'' [/u] Oyundaki bazı sahneler birebir ilk oyundaki sahnelerin farklı perspektiften görünümü ve ana oyunla bağlantılı bu yüzden aynı evrende geçen bambaşka bir oyun gibi hissettirmiyor.

Ana hikaye olarak Half-Life evrenini etkilemiyor fakat Black Mesa faciasını bir de askerlerin gözünden deneyimliyoruz.

Eğer Half-Life evrenini daha ayrıntılı bir şekilde görmek istiyorsanız ve Half-Life'in oynanış mekaniklerini seviyorsanız kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

 [h1] İNCELEME PUANI : 81 / 100 [/h1]

Not as good as the original HL, and not as good as Blue Shift. Didn't think much of Opposing Force when it came out, and nothing's changed twenty or so years later.

[b]The good[/b]

Added weapons over what HL 1 provided
Some difficult boss fights

[b]The bad[/b]

Level design is a mess
Doesn't have that buzz that HL1 gave
Cliched black ops storyline
Short, four hours tops
And...the game isn't that much fun.
Ottima espansione con nuove armi, nuovi nemici e un nuovo punto di vista nelle vicende di Balck Mesa.

Nice add-on where you experience the Black Mesa incident from a military point of view. The weapons and combat are improved in comparison with original Half-Life though it has some difficult sections as well. Small drawbacks are the thin story and a missing grand finale.

This old game is even maintained up to these days so it supports modern resolutions as well.

Great game, this may be my favorite of the original Half-Life expansion packs. Gearbox co-developed this one with Valve along with Half-Life: Blue Shift and Half-Life:Decay.

In this one you play as Adrian Shephard, a Marine sent in to Black Mesa during the original anomalies. The game play is solid with some unique twists for the time. If you liked the first Half-life you can't really go wrong here. To complete, it should take you between 6 and 9 hours if you pace yourself. There are a few bugs and I found myself stuck in walls from time to time, but nothing you can't get out of if you save often enough.

Very solid game, I'm hoping that Adrian Shephard makes it back into future installments.

[h1][b] Первый прекрасный аддон для знаковой игры в игровой индустрии. [/b] [/h1]
Скажу сразу, стоит ли играть данный аддон ?
Конечно, да, господа из Gearbox смогли изменить игровой опыт от игры в первый Half-life максимально разнообразив всё, что есть в этой игре.
Однажды я порекомендовал этот аддон, но в него не хотели играть, думая что тут будет лишь другая история, но будут те же самые локации, то же самое оружие и те же самые враги которые успевали надоесть за 10-12 часов прохождения первого Half-Life. Однако, поиграв в данный аддон, мнение о нём кардинально менялось, кроме изменений которые коснулись всего в игре, так же появились новые игровые механики, с помощью которых сделали новые головоломки и новые интересные ситуации.
В общем, после прохождения Half-Life рекомендую поиграть в этот аддон, если кто ещё не успел.

Now, this I can get behind. When people say this is one of the best expansions ever made, they're not joking.

I didn't really like the original base game of Half-Life despite its innovations and advancements, because the frustrating bits completely ruined the immersion and experience for me. But Opposing Force has very little if not zero frustrating parts, and is overall much more enjoyable.

Opposing Force is incredibly immersive, and I actually felt the tension and connection to our silent protagonist the whole time. I think the story here is told in a much better way than the base game, but to properly enjoy it, you must have played the original game first.

Well, there's not much to say here, it's more Half-Life, with less frustrating bits and more refined good parts. You can do a lot more here, actually; there's lots of new weapons to use, lots of new enemies to fight, and you can even command allied squads sometimes! The level design here is great, with tons of areas where you have to actually think to progress, but not as difficult and frustrating as Half-Life. The night vision feature is also pretty cool and useful.

It's hard to say much about this game without spoiling it, so I'll just end this by saying I heavily reccomend it and you should definitely play it, whether you liked the original Half-Life or not.
по моему мнению даже лучше оригинального half life за счёт большого количества вооружения,большего количества обитателей зена и новых локаций

I love the fact that it expands the universe of Half-life. Also the game play and overall experience of the game is fantastic. In the future i plan on writing a load of books, and the Half-life games are what mostly inspire me to create, action packed, somewhat realistic, science fiction stories, Thanks Valve and Gear box! Even though this game was made two years and twelve months before i was born, Opposing force truly is a legendary, hair raising game and i recommend to anyone who want the enjoy a great game for it's story, not it's graphics (The graphics to me are really good, but we all have our own preseptions) :)

The squad combat is even better than regular Half-Life, the new guns are great, especially the alien/organic guns though the desert eagle is nothing to scoff at.
Enemies are great and the final boss isn't awful this time around.
A solid expansion, if you love Half-Life you'll love this.
Be warned there's an annoying mouse bug many people suffer from, but easy to fix so no biggie (enable raw mouse input in settings).

Really great expansion for the original Half Life; has a shocking amount of original mechanics and an arsenal of weapons that rival any other game in the series in terms of variety. If you enjoyed the original, be sure to pick this one up.

Первое дополнение к замечательной игре Half-Life. В Half-Life Opposing Force нам даётся увидеть инцидент в Чёрной Мезе с глаз военных.
Плюсы:
 - Сюжет
 - Геймплей (С новым видом оружия и новыми врагами)
 - Графен (Для своего времени)
 - Звук (Для своего времени)
 - Сложность (Не уступает оригиналу, даже порой местами сложнее)
Минуса:
 - Отсутствие официального русификатора 
 Оценка 10/10

Opposing Force est de loin la meilleure extension d'HL1 (peut être même mieux que HL1 lui même). De nouvelles armes, de nouveaux monstres et la possibilité de contrôler des unités alliées... tout cela rend le jeu très sympa et agréable a jouer. Durée de vie très correcte (encore un point positif comparé à Blue Shift).
Muy buen juego y buena historia
